hero_title: Access the Next Level of Possibility: Your Phone and PC as One.
hero_subtitle: Experience the ultimate utility. Easily connect the mobile and desktop worlds to freely expand your workflow.
feature_1_desc: No cloud, no cables. Connect with a simple QR code and treat your phone like a part of your PC.
feature_2_desc: Customizable to user requirements. Streamline all your tasks with your own unique layout.
feature_3_desc: Unlike expensive left-hand devices, it won't break down and doesn't need replacing. Your smartphone becomes your original device.
feature_4_desc: Also supports command calls, enabling flexible connection with IOT devices. The possibilities are endless. Build your own integrated system.
use_case_1_desc: Bring new possibilities to your stream with a single touch. The freely customizable layout supports not only buttons but also various swipe actions. Upgrade your live stream with highly flexible stream effects.
use_case_2_desc: Instantly launch your favorite editing software from your phone. Register your usual shortcuts to speed up the realization of your art. No need to buy expensive left-hand devices anymore. We back up the startup and work efficiency of all creators.
use_case_3_desc: Manage game invites and chats on your PC without interrupting your session. Simplify key switching and actions on your phone. Take both communication and play to the next level. We provide a more refined experience for a wide range of players, from professionals to casual users.
download_desc: Available for Windows and macOS. The mobile companion app is available on Google Play and the App Store.

privacy_policy_p1: Tech Union Devices (hereinafter referred to as "the Site") establishes the following privacy policy (hereinafter referred to as "this Policy") regarding the handling of users' personal information in the services provided on this website (hereinafter referred to as "the Service").
privacy_policy_p2: "Personal Information" shall mean "personal information" as defined in the Act on the Protection of Personal Information, and shall refer to information about a living individual which can identify the specific individual by name, date of birth, address, telephone number, contact information or other description contained in such information, and data related to appearance, fingerprints, voiceprints, and the insurer number on a health insurance card, which can identify the specific individual from such information alone (personal identification information).
privacy_policy_p3: The Site may ask for personal information such as name and email address when a user uses the inquiry form.
privacy_policy_h2_3: Article 3 (Purpose of Collecting and Using Personal Information)
privacy_policy_p4: The purposes for which the Site collects and uses personal information are as follows:
privacy_policy_li1: To respond to inquiries from users (including identity verification)
privacy_policy_li2: To send important notices and other necessary communications
privacy_policy_li3: Purposes incidental to the above purposes of use
privacy_policy_p5:
The Site shall change the purpose of use of personal information only when it is reasonably recognized that the purpose of use after the change is related to the purpose of use before the change.
When the purpose of use is changed, the changed purpose shall be notified to the user or announced on this website in a manner prescribed by the Site.
privacy_policy_h2_5: Article 5 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
privacy_policy_p6: Except in the following cases, the Site will not provide personal information to a third party without the prior consent of the user. However, this excludes cases permitted by the Personal Information Protection Act and other laws and regulations.
privacy_policy_li4: When it is necessary for the protection of a person's life, body, or property and it is difficult to obtain the consent of the person
privacy_policy_li5: When it is particularly necessary for the improvement of public health or the promotion of the sound growth of children and it is difficult to obtain the consent of the person
privacy_policy_li6: When it is necessary to cooperate with a national agency, a local government, or a person entrusted by either of them in executing the affairs prescribed by laws and regulations, and obtaining the consent of the person is likely to hinder the execution of the said affairs
privacy_policy_p7: This site uses cookies for access analysis. Cookies are used to identify your browser, but your anonymity is maintained because they cannot identify a specific individual. If you do not wish to use cookies, you can disable them in your browser settings.
privacy_policy_p8:
The contents of this Policy may be changed without notice to the user, except as otherwise provided by law or in this Policy.
Unless otherwise specified by the Site, the revised Privacy Policy shall become effective when it is posted on this website.
privacy_policy_p9: For inquiries regarding this Policy, please use the inquiry form below.
